The Four Pillars of Secure AI from KEMET: The Four Pillars of Secure AI from KEMET.AI
Built Specifically for Government (Multi: Advanced Architecture Combining Retrieval, Generation, and Verification: Our cutting-edge engineering design doesn't just generate answers; it ensures reliable Auditing and Verification of the retrieved information from your data sources. Instant Respond desc: Instant Response: Get Accurate Answers in Under Two Seconds: Speed is paramount in risk assessment and customer service. Our solutions accelerate the search and analysis process from hours to under two seconds, supporting Rapid Decision-Making and massively increasing workforce efficiency. This efficiency translates directly into high Return on Investment (ROI).
Total Data Security desc: Total Security: Your Data Never Leaves Your Infrastructure: We are committed to the principle of Sovereign AI. The Education sector struggles with mass: The Education sector struggles with massive volumes

The Education sector struggles with massive volumes of curricula, research, and administrative documents, while needing to protect student data privacy. KEMET.AI provides Sovereign AI solutions to turn academic archives into an instant knowledge assistant supporting administrators and researchers.

The Sovereign AI concept is applied to ensure all academic data, including student records and exam results, remains under the complete control of the educational institution. This guarantees compliance with all privacy requirements and prevents risks of external breaches or sharing

We've Been Building Applied AI Since 202: We've Been Building Applied AI Since 2020
Kemet AI is a software house specialized in AI. We design, build, and deploy intelligent systems for governments and enterprises in the Middle East.
Trust desc: We build AI that can live fully inside national infrastructure.
Clarity desc: Every generated answer is tied to sources. We enable decisions that can stand in front of leadership, audit, or court.
Impact desc: We care about helping a customs team escalate a risk case in minutes, not posting 'we're doing AI' slides on social media.
Ownership desc: Most global AI tools treat Arabic like a translation problem. We treat it like an intelligence surface.
Work With Us desc: We're building sovereign generative intelligence for some of the most critical organizations in the region
Privacy Policy Of Kemet desc: At Kemet.AI, We Are Committed To Protecting The Privacy Of Our Website Visitors And Clients. This Privacy Policy Describes How We Collect, Use, And Disclose Your Information When You Use Our Services And Website.
Data Security desc: We implement appropriate security measures (such as encryption and access control procedures) to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
Your Rights desc: You have the right to access, correct, or request the deletion of your personal information that we hold, in accordance with applicable law.
We May Collect Two Types Of Information: We May Collect Two Types Of Information

Personally Identifiable Information (PII): Information you voluntarily provide to us, such as your name, email address, phone number, and company information when filling out contact forms or requesting services.
Usage Data: Information collected automatically when you use the website, such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and the time and date of your visit.
How We Use Your Information desc: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including to provide and improve our services, to respond to your inquiries, and to comply with applicable laws and regulations.
We Use The Collected Information For Var: We Use The Collected Information For Various Purposes
To Provide And Manage The AI And Software Development Services You Request
To Respond To Your Inquiries And Requests Submitted Via The "Contact Us" Form
To Improve And Personalize The User Experience And Our Website
For Marketing And Communication Purposes, Unless You Opt Out
To Comply With Legal And Regulatory Obligations
Acceptance of Terms desc: By accessing and using our website and/or the services provided by Kemet.AI (including AI, Machine Learning, and Big Data Analytics solutions), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you must not use the website and services.
Services desc: We provide specialized technology solutions and services in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Big Data Analytics, and Software Development (Web and Mobile). All services are subject to a separate Statement of Work (SOW) which will define the scope, pricing, and intellectual property ownership.
Intellectual Property Rights desc: All content on the website, including text, logos, designs, and AI solutions, is the property of Kemet.AI or its licensors and is protected by copyright laws. Copying or using any content without prior written permission is strictly prohibited.
User Conduct desc 1: You agree not to use the website for any unlawful or prohibited purpose under these Terms. You are strictly prohibited from
User Conduct desc 2: Uploading or posting any content that infringes upon the rights of any third party.
User Conduct desc 3: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to any part of the website or services.
User Conduct desc 4: Using the website to disseminate malware or viruses.
Limitation of Liability desc: Kemet.AI shall not be liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from the use or inability to use the website or services.
Governing Law desc: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws
Get in touch desc: Kemet AI is a software house specialized in AI. We design, build, and deploy intelligent systems for governments and enterprises in the Middle East.
What is the concept of Sovereign AI that: What is the concept of Sovereign AI that KEMET.AI offers ?

Sovereign AI ensures that all processing, analysis, and storage of a client's sensitive data are strictly confined within their own operational environment (On-Premises or Private Cloud). This provides governmental and regulated clients with Absolute Data Control, ensuring Compliance with local laws and eliminating any sharing with third-party or external algorithms.
How does KEMET guarantee answer accuracy: How does KEMET.AI guarantee answer accuracy in custom solutions ?

We guarantee accuracy through advanced Retrieval and Verification mechanisms. Instead of relying on guesswork, our system exclusively retrieves answers from the client's Internal, Documented Knowledge Base, then presents the answer with Full Traceability and citation to the original source file. This methodology ensures Instant Verification and eliminates risks of inaccurate information.
Do your AI solutions require us to trans: Do your AI solutions require us to transfer our data to external servers ?

No, this is fundamental to our security model. Our solutions are designed for full deployment within your private data centers (On-Premises) or a Private Cloud setup. Your sensitive data never leaves your operational environment, which is a core security and legal guarantee for clients in sensitive sectors.
What is the expected Return on Investmen: What is the expected Return on Investment (ROI) from automating Compliance and Audit tasks ?
The ROI is measurable and substantial in: The ROI is measurable and substantial in terms of cost and time
What is the expected Return on Investmen: Our solutions reduce the time spent on Contract Review and Auditing by up to 70% and significantly improve Risk Detection Accuracy. This drastically cuts annual operating costs and prevents substantial potential legal fines resulting from human errors.
How can your solutions help improve Cont: How can your solutions help improve Contact Center performance ?
We provide advanced Contact Center AI fo: We provide advanced Contact Center AI focused on augmenting cognitive tasks
How can your solutions help improve Cont: 1. Real-Time Agent Assistance: Supplying agents with precise answers from the internal knowledge base during the call.
2. Performance Analysis: Automated call quality monitoring and Sentiment Analysis extraction to identify customer trends, thereby boosting agent efficiency and improving response speed.
Can your system handle billions of docum: Can your system handle billions of documents, and how quickly ?

Yes. Our multi-layered architecture is specifically engineered to handle Billions of Documents and Massive Archives. Our system is capable of retrieving and presenting fully documented answers in Under Two Seconds, making it ideal for environments requiring Instant Response and rapid decision-making.
Do KEMET solutions support Arabic and ot: Do KEMET.AI solutions support Arabic and other multilingual data ?
Yes, we have a distinct technical advantage here.

Our core solutions are designed to be Cross-lingual, with advanced capabilities to process, understand, and retrieve information from documents written in both Modern Standard Arabic and English, as well as several other languages, supporting clients across the MENA region.
What security measures are in place to p: What security measures are in place to protect data from unauthorized access?
We enforce rigorous, non-negotiable secu: We enforce rigorous, non-negotiable security protocols, including
What security measures are in place to p: 1. Full Encryption (TLS/AES): For all data in transit and at rest.
2. Audit Logging: To track all user actions and system operations.
3. Role-Based Access Control (RBAC): To ensure every employee can only access information permitted by their internal security roles.
